description: A young guy, originally from Slovakia, looked for a job at our agency today. He was quite desperate because no one wanted to hire him. He used to work as a construction worker helping with renovation of historical buildings, which was kind of commendable. He had a technical education and wanted a job in that area. I had one open but he didn´t fit the profile that well. Still, I wanted to get to know the boy more intimately so I made him an offer. He liked it but our mediation fee was too high for him. So I made him another offer. He hesitated a lot, I was getting nervous that I might loose the boy but he agreed eventually. He was really in deep financial problems and let me to do everything I desired. It cost me a lot but his super tight ass was one of the best I tasted lately.
title: Dirty Scout 99
